src_original: ity evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kāyavedanācittadharmaprabhedena bahavaḥ paryāyā veditavyāḥ /
tatra caturṇāṃ viparyāsānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni /
tgt_original: yasmāccaturo viparyāsān bhindanti tasmāccatvāryevocyante smṛtyupasthānāni (na nyūnādhikāni) ||
4 | kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ katamat |  yasmāt śucisaṃjñāviparyāsaṃ vyantīkaroti tasmāt kāyasatyalakṣaṇaṃ pratyavekṣate (yadidaṃ)  ṣaṭtriṃśadaśucayaḥ |

src_original: yā asya bahulaṃkurvanmanasikurvataḥ,  aśucau śucīti viparyāsaḥ prahīyate /
